title: Living Ready Presents, Stay Alive (2014)
description:
thePiratePimp note :


Living Ready Presents Stay Alive (2014)


English | PDF | 108 pages | 17.1 MB


Stay Alive, the annual issue from Living Ready, offers year-round survival and preparedness information for everyday readiness. Look forward to these great features.

~The Top 50 Items: What Disappears After an Emergency
~Post-Disaster Tools
~The Modern Air Rifle as a Legitimate Survival Tool<
~Best Survival Knives
~Generator Basics: Considerations Before You Buy
~Space Blanket vs. Sleeping Bag Showdown: Which One Will Keep You Warmer?
~Customize Your Bug-Out Vehicle
~Survival Firearms: Six Requirements to Understand
~Water: Procure and Purify
~Food Storage: Solid Advice on Storing Food for the Long Term
~Preserve Your Garden Bounty
~Sustainable Feast: Grow Your Own Food and Take Control
~Backyard Foraging: Identify Common Edible Plants
~Survival Hacks: Household Items Transformed into Survival Gear
~Fortify Your Home
~Emergency Lighting
~Trick Out Your Phone as a Multi-Tool
~Easy Knife Sharpening: Use This Trick
~Know Your Knife Rights
~Medical Know-How
~The Day the Cell Phones Died
~Be a Hard Target: Awareness is Key to Avoiding Danger
~A True Story of Surviving the World's Worst Hurricane
~Photo Essay: Tiny Houses
